#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <math.h>
#include <cmath>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <sstream>


using namespace std;

int ispalin(string s)
{

    int n = s.size();
    char a[n];
    int j = n-1,i=0;
    while(j>= 0)
    {
        a[j] = s[i];

        j--;i++;
    }
    int t = 1;
    for(int r = 0;r<n;r++)
    {
        if(a[r] != s[r]) t = 0;
    }
    return t;
}

int isprime(int n)
{
    int t = sqrt(n);
    //cout<<"sqrt(101) = "<<t<<endl;
    int y = 1;
    for(int i = 2;i<=t;i++)
    {
       // cout<<"i is = "<<i<<" t%i is = "<<n%i<< endl;
        if(n%i == 0) y = 0;
    }
    //cout<<"y is = "<<y<<endl;
    return y;
}

int main()
{

    int n;
    cin>>n;

    int w = n;

    //cout<<isprime(101);
    //int q = 0;
    int t = 0;
    while(t == 0)
    {
        stringstream ss;
    ss<<w;
    string s = ss.str();
        if(ispalin(s) == 1 && isprime(w) == 1)
        {
            t = 1;
        }
        w++;
    }
    cout<<w-1;

    return 0;
}
